name: nextjs-and-capacitor-isomorphic-example
description: Example of using next.js (client side and server side) with capacitor

scripts.build-mobile: next build && next export && npx cap sync
scripts.build-mobile-run-client: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npm run start
scripts.build-mobile-run-android: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
